project.name: Emission Omission
project.description:
Collaborated with hackathon team of 4 to program a web application in 48 hours that calculates the carbon emissions of a vehicleâ€™s travel between two points using Google Maps API.
Designed website layout using Figma and coded front-end using React, Git, and npm.

project.name: Client Server Chat
project.description: Designed multi-threaded server-client chat program in Python using TCP and UDP protocols with encryption. Coded chat log system which saves chat session contents to server file for client viewing.

project.name: Etch A Sketch
project.description: Created interactive drawing grid using JavaScript which listens for mouse hovering events. Constructed website layout using HTML and CSS after designing UI in Figma.

project.name: Restaurant Optimization Program
project.description: Created restaurant simulation using Python to exemplify multithreaded resourse allocation. Modeled optimal restaurant management using semaphores to control shared resources and avoid deadlocks.
